spec_value: Centrifugal pump to conform to API 610
Single mechanical seal (dual for butanes, VP>10 psi, sour)
Self‑flush preferred; external FLO only if self‑flush infeasible
Electric motor drive (steam turbine only for critical)
Automatic if motor > 15 kW; manual if ≤ 15 kW
Motor sized for end‑of‑curve head w/ discharge valve open
